articles.title: The Best Gadgets and Hi-Fi Releases of 2025 - Gear Patrol
articles.description: A countdown of the year's most important tech and gadget releases, including new gear from Apple, Hasselblad and more.
articles.content:
Comet, the new AI-native browser from Perplexity, launched this summer, is the rare exception. And its arrival makes for one of the more complicated GP100 decisions weve ever had to make.
